Random stop. Owner is very warm, engaging and accommodating. Limited menu (which I view as a good sign) but the dish I selected was generously portioned but nothing to rave about.

Portions are generous and tasty. The sallad bar if fine and the Cantuccini with the coffee is a fine ending to a good meal.

column7: Gourmeeet- italien-better than the best in Milano and Roma!
column9:
Unbelibable  good Totreloni with green   red or white sauce. They change evry week.

Al teh vegetarian pastas I tried- 5 - is fantastic!

And godd cicilian- pizza bread and salad is free for lunch.

Wery friendly  Owner and  staff.

Nice room .     Good  PIZZA

Wonderful place to get good, really Italian food for lunch or in the evening. No advanced cooking, men homemade food stuff with tastes like in an Italian home. Good pasta och outstanding pizza. Love it!
Saturday evening dinner with their fixed 3 course menu for around £20, very good value with a pasta starter, Lamb fillet main and the home made Tiramisu to finish

column7: Great for late afternoon sun and friendly service

A nice small place. The host is very charming and helpful with the menu (which is all in non-English). The pizza were one of the best we had. A good collections of wines too.

I really like this place, a small authentic Italian restaurant! The owner and all the stuff is friendly, warm and helpful and the food simply taste amazing! I went several times with friends, colleagues and it was always a success.

column7: Average Italian place loving salt too much

column7: Great Italian restaurant with lots of heart
column9: Very friendly staff and atmosphere, really good food and lots of it. This is not a "fancy" place but rather a genuine authentic family restaurant serving fairly simple (but tasty) dishes which I find superb.

This is a small and cozy lunch restaurant which serves wonderful traditional Italian food. They serve 3 different dishes which changes from day to day. 
The price is a barging, only 80 Swedish Crowns for the dish including non alcoholic beverage, salad buffet and coffee....More
